June 6th, 2007
Here's a review of the Iliad Cenotaphs from bioephemera. A nice comparison with the casts from Pompei. For more on Pompeii, check out Allan MCcollum's Dog From Pompeii.
May 17th, 2007
I just found a shout out from a former student, Min Kwon. This is why no $ job can ever compare to teaching. Plus you should check out the site just to see how ridiculously talented she is. Thanks Min.
May 5th, 2007
I've redesigned this site, so that everything is a little bit simpler to navigate.

The Project Tab has two options:
1) View Features projects, where I will highlight recent projects & archives recently added to the site.
2) Project Catalogue, which lists all documented projects by number.

The Timeline Tag has been drastically simplified. This is the best place to view the newest major projects, or to see what happened when.

What used to be the Cladogram Tag is now the Maps Tag. I hope to add many more site maps here soon. For now it has a map of every R1 through R6.

The Links Tag will still give you my contact information, but now also has the beginnings of a list of external links you might want to check out.

Also, the much requested One Inch Show is still available for your delight.

And of course the best place to find something new will always be the Daily Project [T56].
